title: Agent Cognitive Budget Schema
description: Schema for tracking the cognitive budget and usage of agents.

agents.description: Dictionary mapping agent IDs to their budget information.

current_budget.description: The current remaining cognitive budget for the agent.

max_budget.description: The maximum cognitive budget allocated to the agent per cycle/period.

usage_history.description: A log of budget usage events.

loop_id.description: The loop ID during which the usage occurred.

amount_used.description: Amount of budget used in this event.

reason.description: Reason or context for the budget usage.

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last budget update for this agent.

last_calculation_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last global budget calculation or update.

calculation_method.description: Method used for the last budget calculation.
